title: Page 1
content: A little white snowflake that lived in the sky, Kept looking down here with a tear in its eye; And wherever it looked, alas, it could see The ground was as bare, and as brown, as could be; And out of the windows, the childrens' bright eyes Looked wistfully up, at the gray winter skies, While one little fellow was crying outright, Because the white snowflakes were nowhere in sight, And how could Santa come In his reindeer sleigh, And Christmas now only Just two days away?

book.title: A Christmas Snowflake: A Rhyme for Children
book.description: 简介： 是一本关于圣诞节的英语儿童读物，是一本只有32页的短篇小说...
